page.title: 04MY TYPICAL MONDAY AT SCHOOL.
page.content: My Monday at school begins with registration. After registration I have Science in the laboratory. We do lots of experiments all the time which is great fun! Art is next. We alternate each term between pottery, art and drawing. I have art this term. It is fun, we have to draw the tie and the shirt of the person opposite putting in all the shadows. After lunch it is Music and we usually use the keyboards. The school has about twenty, there are lots of different sounds you can make on them and they have three octaves. Next is French in the language laboratory. We use the earphones to listen and answer the tapes. We always hope the teacher is not listening in to us! I really enjoy my Monday at school!
